/// Fozzy - Intelligence Layer
/// Homethic - Copyright 2014

Fozzy is an Intelligence Layer that extends your DotNet objects 
with ubiquitous Semantic capabilities, therefore making your application 
instantly Internet of Things ("IoT") ready.

Please see :
https://fozzy.codeplex.com/

Please note that this version of Fozzy code is not operational yet,
and should be considered for discussion purposes only.

So please talk with us about Fozzy and where we should take it :
https://fozzy.codeplex.com/discussions
